typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CUSTOMERID as string,
		CUSTOMERTIER as string,
		LASTNAME as string,
		FIRSTNAME as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		ADDRESS1 as string,
		ADDRESS2 as string,
		ADDRESS3 as string,
		CITY as string,
		CITY2 as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string,
		PREFDELIVMETHOD as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		CREATEDATE as string,
		CURRENCY as string,
		ORDERAMOUNT as string,
		STATUS as string,
		MISCDATE as string,
		LAST_MODF_DT as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ALLCUSTOMERS
source(output(
		CUSTOMERID as string,
		CUSTOMER_REGION as string,
		CUSTOMERTIER as string,
		LASTNAME as string,
		FIRSTNAME as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		ADDRESS1 as string,
		ADDRESS2 as string,
		ADDRESS3 as string,
		CITY as string,
		CITY2 as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string,
		PREFDELIVMETHOD as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		CREATEDATE as string,
		CURRENCY as string,
		ORDERAMOUNT as string,
		STATUS as string,
		MISCDATE as string,
		LAST_MODF_DT as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> BOSTONCUSTOMERS
ALLCUSTOMERS, BOSTONCUSTOMERS join(ALLCUSTOMERS@CUSTOMERID == BOSTONCUSTOMERS@CUSTOMERID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMERID = {ALLCUSTOMERS@CUSTOMERID},
		CUSTOMERTIER = {ALLCUSTOMERS@CUSTOMERTIER},
		LASTNAME = {ALLCUSTOMERS@LASTNAME},
		FIRSTNAME = {ALLCUSTOMERS@FIRSTNAME},
		COMPANY = {ALLCUSTOMERS@COMPANY},
		ADDRESS1 = {ALLCUSTOMERS@ADDRESS1},
		CITY = {ALLCUSTOMERS@CITY},
		STATE = {ALLCUSTOMERS@STATE},
		ZIP = {ALLCUSTOMERS@ZIP},
		COUNTRY = {ALLCUSTOMERS@COUNTRY},
		ORDERAMOUNT = {ALLCUSTOMERS@ORDERAMOUNT},
		STATUS = {ALLCUSTOMERS@STATUS}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(CUSTOMERID = CUSTOMERID),
	TOTAL_ORDER_AMOUNT = sum(toInteger(ORDERAMOUNT)),
		each(match(!in(['CUSTOMERID'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(input(
		CUSTOMERID as string,
		CUSTOMERTIER as string,
		LASTNAME as string,
		FIRSTNAME as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		ADDRESS1 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		STATUS as string,
		TOTAL_ORDER_AMOUNT as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['DELETE FROM ALL_CUST_AGG;'],
	mapColumn(
		CUSTOMERID,
		CUSTOMERTIER,
		LASTNAME,
		FIRSTNAME,
		COMPANY,
		ADDRESS1,
		CITY,
		STATE,
		ZIP,
		COUNTRY,
		STATUS,
		TOTAL_ORDER_AMOUNT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
